en_query: Summarize the meeting
fr_query: Rsumer la runion
en_summary: The meeting concerned mostly status updates and logistical affairs. The participants learned that the transcription status was good. The progress on the DARPA demo was also good, except the interface did not look as pretty as they had wanted to. The storage disks, which they had been waiting for, had finally arrived, but the person responsible for installing them was going on break. The participants also decided to schedule less meetings and they will report updates  when they do. The meeting ended with technical discussion about model performance.
fr_summary: La runion concernait principalement les mises  jour de statut et les affaires logistiques. Les participants ont appris que l'tat de la transcription tait bon. Les progrs sur la dmo DARPA taient galement bons, sauf que l'interface n'tait pas aussi jolie qu'ils l'avaient souhait. Les disques de stockage qu'ils attendaient taient enfin arrivs, mais la personne charge de les installer tait en pause. Les participants ont galement dcid de planifier moins de runions, afin qu'ils aient des mises  jour  signaler. La runion s'est termine par une discussion technique sur les performances du modle.

en_query: Summarize the meeting
fr_query: Rsumer la runion
en_summary: The meeting began with a discussion on the TORRENT project completion being pushed for two years. Grad F then introduced intermediate categorization, which was his topic for his qualification exams. The team then discussed mean subtraction from SRI. Using it had led to an improvement in Meeting Recorder digits though near mic performance worsened. The professor points to pre-echoes as the culprit. The team continued to study differences between SRI and Aurora. The team thought it would be interesting to do the Aurora tests with the SRI system instead of the HTK. The team was also exploring the Wiener filter and VTS. The professor did not seem too excited about the VTS.
fr_summary: La runion a commenc par une discussion sur l'achvement du projet TORRENT qui est repouss depuis deux ans. Diplm F a ensuite introduit la catgorisation intermdiaire, qui tait son sujet pour ses examens de qualification. L'quipe a ensuite discut de la soustraction moyenne du SRI . Son utilisation a entran une amlioration des chiffres de l'enregistreur de runion, bien que les performances proches du micro se soient dtriores. Le professeur dsigne les pr-chos comme coupables. L'quipe a continu  tudier les diffrences entre le SRI et Aurora. L'quipe a pens qu'il serait intressant de faire les tests Aurora avec le systme SRI au lieu du HTK. L'quipe explorait galement le filtre de Wiener et le VTS . Le professeur ne semblait pas trop enthousiasm par le VTS .

en_query: Please describe the semantic specification
fr_query: Veuillez dcrire la spcification smantique
en_summary: The semantic specification, on the other hand, is split into three levels: "scenario" is a list of schemas and bindings between them, which describes the current event in terms of Source-Path-Goal, Container, etc.; "referent" is about the entities in the discourse and includes grammatical information and pointers to the ontology; "discourse segment" comprises utterance-specific things.
fr_summary: La spcification smantique, quant  elle, est divise en trois niveaux :  scenario  est une liste de schmas et de liaisons entre eux, qui dcrit l'vnement en cours en termes de Source-Path-Goal, Container, etc. ;  rfrent  concerne les entits du discours et inclut des informations grammaticales et des pointeurs vers l'ontologie ;  segment de discours  comprend des choses spcifiques  l'nonc.

en_query: What was said on speech overlap?
fr_query: Qu'a-t-il t dit sur le chevauchement de discours ?
en_summary: Efforts by a PhD student are in progress to detect overlapping speech. For a single transcribed meeting, the Phd Student reported approximately 300 cases of overlap. Future work will involve manually deriving time marks from sections of overlapping speech for the same meeting, and then experimenting with different measures, e.g. energy increase, to determine a set of acoustically salient features for identifying speaker overlap.
fr_summary: Des efforts de ltudiant de doctorat sont en cours pour dtecter les paroles qui se chevauchent. Pour une seule runion transcrite, l'orateur mn005 a rapport environ 300 cas de chevauchement. Les travaux futurs impliqueront de driver manuellement des repres temporels  partir de sections de discours qui se chevauchent pour la mme runion, puis d'exprimenter diffrentes mesures, par exemple, augmentation d'nergie, pour dterminer un ensemble de caractristiques acoustiquement saillantes pour identifier le chevauchement des orateurs.

en_query: What did the professor think about clustering?
fr_query: Que pense le professeur du clustering ?
en_summary: The professor was not too excited about clustering. He thought that the team could identify the bands that were the most promising and weigh them more highly in the model. As it stood, the model was using all bands with equal strength.
fr_summary: Le professeur n'tait pas trop enthousiasm par le regroupement. Il pensait que l'quipe pourrait identifier les groupes les plus prometteurs et les peser plus fortement dans le modle. Dans l'tat actuel des choses, le modle utilisait toutes les bandes avec une force gale.

en_query: What did Graduate A think about setting up the recording equipment?
fr_query: Qu'a pens A de l'installation de l'quipement d'enregistrement ?
en_summary: Grad A noted that all participants will have to sign a consent form and read out digits and are requested that microphones be kept away from the mouth to minimize breathing sounds. Grad A also mentioned that people will be anonymized in the transcript. Grad A explained that the goal was to eventually be able to query meetings for information.
fr_summary: Diplm A a not que tous les participants devraient signer un formulaire de consentement et lire les chiffres et a demand que les microphones soient loigns de la bouche pour minimiser les bruits respiratoires. Diplm A a galement mentionn que les personnes seraient anonymises dans la transcription. Diplm A a expliqu que l'objectif tait de pouvoir ventuellement interroger sur les runions pour obtenir des informations.

phd b: Yes, I 'm playing. Um so I wanted to do this experiment to see um uh what happens if we try to uh improve the performance of the back - end recognizer for the Aurora task and see how that affects things. And so I had this um I think I sent around last week a this plan I had for an experiment, this matrix where I would take the um the original um the original system. So there's the original system trained on the mel cepstral features and then com and then uh optimize the b HTK system and run that again. So look at the difference there and then uh do the same thing for the ICSI - OGI front - end.
professor a: What which test set was this?
phd b: This is that I looked at?
professor a: Mm - hmm.
phd b: Uh I 'm looking at the Italian right now.
professor a: Mm - hmm.
phd b: So as far as I 've gotten is I 've uh been able to go through from beginning to end the um full HTK system for the Italian data and got the same results that um that uh Stephane had. So um I started looking to and now I 'm I 'm sort of lookin at the point where I wanna know what should I change in the HTK back - end in order to try to uh to improve it. So. One of the first things I thought of was the fact that they use the same number of states for all of the models
professor a: Mm - hmm.
phd b: and so I went on - line and I uh found a pronunciation dictionary for Italian digits
professor a: Mm - hmm.
phd b: and just looked at, you know, the number of phones in each one of the digits. Um you know, sort of the canonical way of setting up a an HMM system is that you use um three states per phone and um so then the the total number of states for a word would just be, you know, the number of phones times three. And so when I did that for the Italian digits, I got a number of states, ranging on the low end from nine to the high end, eighteen. Um. Now you have to really add two to that because in HTK there's an initial null and a final null so when they use uh models that have eighteen states, there 're really sixteen states. They 've got those initial and final null states. And so um their guess of eighteen states seems to be pretty well matched to the two longest words of the Italian digits, the four and five which um, according to my, you know, sort of off the cuff calculation, should have eighteen states each.
professor a: Mm - hmm.
phd b: And so they had sixteen. So that's pretty close. Um but for the most of the words are sh much shorter. So the majority of them wanna have nine states. And so theirs are s sort of twice as long. So my guess uh And then if you I I printed out a confusion matrix um uh for the well - matched case, and it turns out that the longest words are actually the ones that do the best. So my guess about what's happening is that you know, if you assume a fixed the same amount of training data for each of these digits and a fixed length model for all of them but the actual words for some of them are half as long you really um have, you know, half as much training data for those models. Because if you have a long word and you 're training it to eighteen states, uh you 've got you know, you 've got the same number of Gaussians, you 've gotta train in each case,
professor a: Mm - hmm.
phd b: but for the shorter words, you know, the total number of frames is actually half as many.

en_query: How would the mental spaces operate?
fr_query: Comment fonctionneraient les espaces mentaux ?
en_summary: Mental spaces can be tackled with mechanisms that can also deal with context issues (time, space etc.): creating a base space and rules of interaction with other interconnected spaces. However, the complexity of these mechanisms has to be bound as well: it is necessary to define the range of constructions to be studied.
fr_summary: Les espaces mentaux peuvent tre abords avec des mcanismes qui peuvent aussi traiter des questions de contexte (temps, espace, etc.) : cration d'un espace de base et de rgles d'interaction avec d'autres espaces interconnects. Cependant, la complexit de ces mcanismes doit galement tre lie : il est ncessaire de dfinir l'ventail des constructions  tudier.

en_query: Summarize the discussion about the working design of the remote control.
fr_query: Rsumez la discussion sur la conception fonctionnelle de la tlcommande.
en_summary: The industrial designer described the product as a portable device with some energy source, an interface which included some pressing buttons and keys, a processor, some infrared source which could send the information to the main device, and different encryption codes for different TVs. Since the Marketing and the user interface designer mentioned speech recognition, the industrial designer also took that into account. All these components would cost 5 Euros or even less than that. As for gesture recognition and automatic power control, the group gave them up due to price issues. At the end of the meeting, the group also talked about how to enable the users to find the controller.
fr_summary: Le designer industriel a dcrit le produit comme un appareil portable avec une source d'nergie, une interface qui comprenait des boutons et des touches, un processeur, une source infrarouge qui pouvait envoyer les informations  l'appareil principal et diffrents codes de cryptage pour diffrents tlviseurs. Puisque le responsable marketing et le concepteur de l'interface utilisateur ont mentionn la reconnaissance vocale, le designer industriel en a galement tenu compte. Tous ces composants coteraient 5 euros ou mme moins que cela. Quant  la reconnaissance gestuelle et au contrle automatique de la puissance, le groupe y a renonc pour des questions de prix.  la fin de la runion, le groupe a galement parl de la manire de permettre aux utilisateurs de trouver le contrleur.

en_query: Summarize the discussion about user interface concept.
fr_query: Rsumez la discussion sur le concept d'interface utilisateur.
en_summary: The user interface designer presented a good-looking design with few buttons. As for the colour, the user interface designer suggested making a backlight of the LCD screen with different colours, but this was denied due to the high cost. Then the industrial designer recommended changing the colour of the assembly at an extra charge to meet special needs. Light and infrared were also taken into consideration to make the controller glow in the dark. In order to make a smart controller, the group mentioned speech recognition and user identification.
fr_summary: Le concepteur de l'interface utilisateur a prsent un design attrayant avec peu de boutons. Quant  la couleur, le concepteur de l'interface utilisateur a suggr de faire un rtro-clairage de l'cran LCD avec diffrentes couleurs, mais cela a t refus en raison du cot lev. Ensuite, le designer industriel a recommand de changer la couleur de l'assemblage moyennant un supplment pour rpondre  des besoins particuliers. La lumire et l'infrarouge ont galement t pris en compte pour faire briller le contrleur dans l'obscurit. Afin de crer un contrleur intelligent, le groupe a mentionn la reconnaissance vocale et l'identification de l'utilisateur.

en_query: What did the group members think of the buttons of the remote control when discussing the desired features of remote control?
fr_query: Qu'ont pens les membres du groupe des boutons de la tlcommande lorsqu'ils ont discut des fonctionnalits souhaites de la tlcommande ?
en_summary: They thought that the number of buttons on existing remote controls should be reduced.So they wanted to make buttons multifunctional to simplify the remote control buttons.And they also thought that the buttons must be internationally recognized.

en_query: What did the industrial designer recommend when discussing industrial components and why?
fr_query: Qu'a recommand le designer industriel lors de la discussion sur les composants industriels et pourquoi ?
en_summary: The industrial designer recommended batteries instead of solar cells because it would be problematic if solar cells didn't have enough energy. Titanium was proposed rather than rubber as the latter would make it difficult to do the moulding of buttons. Besides, the industrial designer wanted a simple push button because it only needed a simple chip and was less expensive than LCD.
fr_summary: Le designer industriel a recommand des piles plutt que des cellules solaires car cela poserait problme si les cellules solaires n'avaient pas assez d'nergie. Le titane a t propos plutt que le caoutchouc car ce dernier rendrait difficile le moulage des boutons. De plus, le designer industriel voulait un simple bouton poussoir car il ne ncessitait qu'une simple puce et tait moins cher que le LCD.

en_query: Summarize the whole meeting.
fr_query: Rsumez toute la runion.
en_summary: The meeting was mainly about the exchange of the preliminary ideas about a new TV remote control project. They first got used to the writeboard and drew some animals with it.Project manager wanted to sell this remote control for twenty five Euro and expected profit will be around fifty million Euro. Afterwards the team raised different opinions about features of the new remote controls and related questions about market potential. Among all the features, having a good look and size were unanimously considered to be the most essential.
fr_summary: La runion portait principalement sur l'change d'ides prliminaires sur un nouveau projet de tlcommande TV. Ils se sont d'abord habitus au tableau d'criture et ont dessin des animaux avec. Le responsable du projet voulait vendre cette tlcommande 25 euros avec un bnfice attendu d'environ cinquante millions d'euros. Par la suite, l'quipe a soulev des opinions diffrentes sur les caractristiques des nouvelles tlcommandes et des questions connexes sur le potentiel du march. Parmi toutes les caractristiques, avoir un bon look et une bonne taille ont t unanimement considres comme les plus essentielles.

en_query: What did the project manager think of the colour and shape of the model when doing product evaluation?
fr_query: Qu'a pens le chef de projet de la couleur et de la forme du modle lors de l'valuation du produit ?
en_summary: The project manager didn't like the strawberry-like sensors on the top because they were not useful. Even though the marketing reminded the manager that fanciness was more important than usefulness, the manager still believed that it would be fancier if the fruit-like thing was useful.
fr_summary: Le chef de projet n'aimait pas les capteurs en forme de fraise sur le dessus car ils n'taient pas utiles. Mme si le responsable marketing a rappel au directeur que la fantaisie tait plus importante que l'utilit, le directeur a quand mme pens que ce serait plus chic si la chose semblable  un fruit tait utile.

en_query: What did the team discuss about the product cost?
fr_query: Qua dit l'quipe concernant le cot du produit ?
en_summary: In terms of the material used on the device, the team decided to use only one material, either rubber or plastic instead of both or titanium. Moreover, the team agreed to discard the joystick but keep the LCD and advance chips,to make it still favored by the young market. Lastly, a normal color would be incorporated instead of a special color to decrease the cost by at least half Euro.
fr_summary: En ce qui concerne le matriau utilis sur l'appareil, l'quipe a dcid d'utiliser un seul matriau, soit du caoutchouc, soit du plastique au lieu des deux ou du titane. De plus, l'quipe a accept de se dbarrasser du joystick mais de conserver l'cran LCD et les puces avances, pour qu'il soit toujours apprci par le jeune march. Enfin, une couleur normale serait incorpore au lieu d'une couleur spciale pour rduire le cot d'au moins 50 centimes.

en_query: How did Marketing design the product evaluation?

en_summary: Marketing wrote down a few evaluation criteria, based on previous marketing strategy, on the latest trends, and on user preferences. There was a seven-point scale rating for each criterion. The team would give comments to each feature listed and agree on the final rating.

en_query: Summarize the whole meeting.
fr_query: Rsumez toute la runion.
en_summary: The main points of the discussion are the design goal and price of a new television remote control project. The group first put forward the design goal of remote control. Then they got used to the whiteboard and wrote down everyone's favourite animal and their characteristics. Project manager and Marketing wanted to sell this remote control for twenty five Euro and expected profit will be around two million Euro. Then, the group thought about colour and function features of the new remote controls. In addition, they also believed that the remote control should be safe enough for children to use, and the appearance should be acceptable to them.
fr_summary: Les principaux points de la discussion sont l'objectif de conception et le prix d'un nouveau projet de tlcommande de tlvision. Le groupe a d'abord mis en avant l'objectif de conception de la tlcommande. Ensuite, ils se sont habitus au tableau blanc et ont not l'animal prfr de chacun et ses caractristiques. Le chef de projet et le responsable marketing voulaient vendre cette tlcommande 25 euros avec un bnfice attendu d'environ deux millions d'euros. Ensuite, le groupe a rflchi  la couleur et aux fonctionnalits des nouvelles tlcommandes. En outre, ils ont galement pens que la tlcommande devait tre suffisamment sre pour tre utilise par les enfants et que son apparence devait tre acceptable pour eux.

Um sends message to another system, so there's an energy source involved in that like a battery or solar power, something along those lines, there's an integrated circuit, which is the microchip, um and that actually compose the messages and usually the way a a remote control works is it sends infrared bits to another system. A user interface controls the chip, basically that's the casing and the buttons and um accordingly the messages as well. So my findings, um I just did a preliminary study here and uh I found that too much metal in remote design could potentially cause interference with the ability of the remote to send commands. And too much metal can cause remotes to behave unexpectedly by receiving false signals. Um too much metal is used sometimes and people pick up radio signals and the like, and there's also the possibility of the remote catching on fire and injuring the customer, just think of those lawsuits, that'd be really bad.

en_query: Summarize the brief presentations on personal ideas towards the design.
fr_query: Rsumez les brves prsentations sur les ides personnelles concernant la conception.
en_summary: Except for the Project Manager, the other three members of the group all did a presentation to show their research findings on the television remote. The Industrial Designer suggested not to use too much metal in case they would disturb the signals. After him, the User Interface focused on the functions that he proposed neither to make the remote too confusing nor cheap-looking. The last one is the Marketing and she introduced the consumer preference as well as the existing problem of easily losing the remote.
fr_summary: l'exception du gestionnaire de projet, les trois autres membres du groupe ont tous fait une prsentation pour montrer leurs rsultats de recherche sur la tlcommande de la tlvision. Le designer industriel a suggr de ne pas utiliser trop de mtal car cela pourrait perturber les signaux. Aprs cela, le concepteur de linterface utilisateur s'est concentre sur les fonctions qu'il proposait pour rendre la tlcommande ni trop confuse ni bon march. Enfin, le responsable marketing a introduit la prfrence des consommateurs ainsi que le problme existant de perdre facilement la tlcommande.

en_query: Summarize the whole meeting.
fr_query: Rsumez toute la runion.
en_summary: The whole meeting was about a detailed prototype of the remote control. As before, this meeting also began with personal presentations. The Industrial Design focused on the components of the remote control, including the energy source, the buttons and the materials, while the User Interface suggested to use voice recognition technique and add secured or hidden programming onto the touch screen. Then the problem came that if they would like to make it so complex, they would go beyond the budget and have to raise the cost. Thus they decided to simplify some functions and buttons. Before the meeting ended, they also discussed the shape of the remote control.
fr_summary: Toute la runion portait sur un prototype dtaill de la tlcommande. Comme auparavant, cette runion a galement commenc par des prsentations personnelles. Le designer industriel s'est concentr sur les composants de la tlcommande, y compris la source d'nergie, les boutons et les matriaux, tandis que le concepteur de l'interface utilisateur a suggr d'utiliser la technique de reconnaissance vocale et d'ajouter une programmation scurise ou cache sur l'cran tactile. Ensuite, le problme est venu du fait que s'ils voulaient le rendre si complexe, ils allaient au-del du budget et devaient augmenter le cot. Ainsi, ils ont dcid de simplifier certaines fonctions et certains boutons. Avant la fin de la runion, ils ont galement discut de la forme de la tlcommande.

en_query: Summarize the presentations on working design, technical functions, functional requirements.
fr_query: Rsumez les prsentations sur la conception de travail, les fonctions techniques, les exigences fonctionnelles.
en_summary: Firstly, Industrial Designer presented on working design, identifying a few basic components of the remote. From the functional design perspective, Industrial Designer introduced what exactly the components were and how they worked with each other. Next, User Interface presented on technical functions design and personally suggested a small size of remote, red in colour and easy to use with must-have buttons. Then, Marketing presented on functional requirements and suggested the group aiming at both the functionality and beauty of the remote.
fr_summary: Tout d'abord, le designer industriel a prsent la conception fonctionnelle, identifiant quelques composants de base de la tlcommande. Du point de vue de la conception fonctionnelle, le designer industriel a prsent ce qu'taient exactement les composants et comment ils fonctionnaient les uns avec les autres. Ensuite, l'interface utilisateur a prsent la conception des fonctions techniques et a personnellement suggr une tlcommande de petite taille, de couleur rouge et facile  utiliser avec des boutons indispensables. Ensuite, le marketing a prsent les exigences fonctionnelles et a suggr au groupe de viser  la fois la fonctionnalit et la beaut de la tlcommande.

en_summary: The user interface designer recommended adding a hand dynamo which could produce electricity from mechanical energy so that it could provide enough energy for the device when users took the controller and pushed the buttons. The proposal was accepted by the group.

en_query: Summarize the whole meeting.
fr_query: Rsumez toute la runion.
en_summary: The meeting was about a preliminary idea of new remote control, covering the price, the functions, the appearance and the name. After a brief self-introduction, Project Manager assigned the task. One of the most important issues of the meeting was about the price. Project Manager supposed the product should be sold at 25 euros with a one hundred percent profit. As it would be a multifunctional remote control, the members were confident that it would stand alone. Moving on to the issue of the appearance, the group analyzed the problems of the existing remotes and briefly talked about the user interface as well as came up with a name of the product.
fr_summary: La runion portait sur une ide prliminaire d'une nouvelle tlcommande, couvrant le prix, les fonctions, l'apparence et le nom. Aprs une brve auto-introduction, le chef de projet a assign la tche. L'une des questions les plus importantes de la runion concernait le prix. Le chef de projet a suppos que le produit devait tre vendu  25 euros avec un profit de cent pour cent. Comme il s'agirait d'une tlcommande multifonctionnelle, les membres taient convaincus qu'elle serait autonome. Passant  la question de l'apparence, le groupe a analys les problmes des tlcommandes existantes et a brivement parl de l'interface utilisateur ainsi que du nom du produit.

en_query: Summarize the discussion about interface concept design.
fr_query: Rsumez la discussion sur la conception du concept d'interface.
en_summary: The team believed that there were always large and many buttons on the standard remote control. To design its unique device, they decided on a pure color one with arrows to eliminate the number of buttons used. They also planned to incorporate the company logo. Moreover, User Interface suggested a set of buttons with its own color to make it recognizable. But this idea was turned down by Project Manager.
fr_summary: L'quipe a pens qu'il y avait toujours de gros et de nombreux boutons sur la tlcommande standard. Pour concevoir son appareil unique, ils ont opt pour un appareil de couleur pure avec des flches pour liminer le nombre de boutons utiliss. Ils ont galement prvu d'intgrer le logo de l'entreprise. De plus, le concepteur de l'interface utilisateur a suggr un ensemble de boutons avec sa propre couleur pour le rendre reconnaissable. Mais cette ide a t rejete par le chef de projet.

en_query: Why did the group think of the push-buttons when discussing the key remote control concepts?
fr_query: Pourquoi le groupe a-t-il pens aux boutons-poussoirs lors de la discussion des concepts cls de la tlcommande ?
en_summary: Industrial Designer mentioned that the push-buttons were their expertise in the industry when discussing the interface. And Industrial Designer thought it seemed to be out of trend, while Marketing thought they had to have push-buttons. Industrial Designer supplemented that if they had LCD displays, users could select everything on the LCD. However, User Interface thought the LCD was just for fast scrolling. So User Interface suggested using it as normal control. Marketing mentioned that they wanted buttons for users and everything else menu-driven.

Et le designer industriel a pens que cela semblait tre hors de la tendance, tandis que le responsable marketing a considr qu'ils devaient avoir des boutons-poussoirs. Le designer industriel a ajout que s'ils disposaient d'crans LCD, les utilisateurs pouvaient tout slectionner sur l'cran LCD. Cependant, le concepteur de linterface utilisateur a dit que l'cran LCD tait juste pour un dfilement rapide. Il a donc suggr de l'utiliser comme contrle normal. Le responsable marketing a mentionn qu'il voulait des boutons pour les utilisateurs et tout le reste pilot par des menus.

en_query: Summarize the whole meeting.
fr_query: Rsumez toute la runion.
en_summary: The team introduced their findings in turns and gradually came to some agreements. First, Industrial Designer introduced the structure of the device and suggested one battery and small size. Meanwhile, Project Manager questioned the cover design since it would not be cheap. Then, User Interface left a question whether the technical function should be basic or multi-functional. After that, Marketing concluded that less important functions should be discarded and the device should be user friendly. Lastly, Project Manager suggested discarding the teletext and asked for ideas about button design.
fr_summary: L'quipe a prsent ses conclusions  tour de rle et est progressivement parvenue  des accords. Tout d'abord, le designer industriel a prsent la structure de l'appareil et a suggr une batterie et une petite taille. Pendant ce temps, le chef de projet a remis en question la conception de la couverture car elle ne serait pas bon march. Ensuite, le concepteur de linterface utilisateur a pos la question de savoir si la fonction technique devait tre basique ou multifonctionnelle. Aprs cela, le responsable marketing a conclu que les fonctions moins importantes devaient tre supprimes et que l'appareil devait tre convivial. Enfin, le chef de projet a suggr de supprimer le tltexte et a demand des ides sur la conception des boutons.

en_query: Summarize the decision discussion about key remote control concepts.
fr_query: Rsumez la discussion de dcision sur les principaux concepts de contrle  distance.
en_summary: They decided to implement a LCD display with a scroll wheel. Instead of using hand dynamos, the group decided to use a wind dynamo which was more environmentally friendly. And they would keep the kinetic energy as an option and keep the spongy material preferences as well as voice recognition. At last, groupmates agreed to apply interchangeable cases with incorporated colours to make the remote more trendy. They would use a simple battery, the advanced chip, a curved side case and rubber buttons.
fr_summary: Ils ont dcid de mettre en uvre un cran LCD avec une molette de dfilement. Au lieu d'utiliser des dynamos manuelles, le groupe a dcid d'utiliser une dynamo olienne, plus respectueuse de l'environnement. Ils conserveraient l'nergie cintique en option et les prfrences matrielles spongieuses ainsi que la reconnaissance vocale. Enfin, les membres de lquipe ont accept d'appliquer des botiers interchangeables avec des couleurs incorpores pour rendre la tlcommande plus tendance. Ils utiliseraient une batterie simple, la puce avance, un botier latral incurv et des boutons en caoutchouc.

en_query: Summarize the discussion about appearance design.
fr_query: Rsumez la discussion sur la conception de l'apparence.
en_summary: To follow the trend of fruit and vegetable, there were two options: something in titanium and smelling like fruit, or something spongy and fruity-like. The industrial designer would explore these two choices and he also suggested having two different assemblies, but the project manager said they couldn't have both. The project manager also mentioned another solution - painting the controller to pretend that it was titanium. The group didn't make a final decision.
fr_summary: Pour suivre la tendance des fruits et lgumes, il y avait deux options : quelque chose en titane et sentant le fruit, ou quelque chose de spongieux et fruit. Le designer industriel explorerait ces deux choix et il a galement suggr d'avoir deux assemblages diffrents, mais le chef de projet a dit qu'ils ne pouvaient pas y avoir les deux. Le chef de projet a galement mentionn une autre solution - peindre le contrleur pour prtendre qu'il tait en titane. Le groupe n'a pas pris de dcision finale.

en_query: What is Industrial Designer's presentation mainly about?
fr_query: En quoi consiste principalement la prsentation du designer industriel ?
en_summary: He talks about something on the components design after having put up the specification properties. As for materials, he used to suggest using hard plastic in order to make the control hard and solid, but at this conference, he thinks that their target audience, young people, love soft colors and materials, like rubber. And he also suggests a shape of a double curved case. As for the buttons, he suggests simple push buttons, without difficult scroll things that makes the control more complex and expensive. And he suggests not using a speaker or a sensor or speech controlled device.
fr_summary: Il a parl de quelque chose sur la conception des composants aprs avoir mis en place les proprits de spcification. Quant aux matriaux, il a suggr d'utiliser du plastique dur afin de rendre la commande dure et solide, mais lors de cette confrence, il a considr que leur public cible, les jeunes, aimait les couleurs douces et les matriaux, comme le caoutchouc. Et il a galement suggr une forme de botier  double courbure. Quant aux boutons, il a propos des boutons poussoirs simples, sans dfilement difficile qui rend le contrle plus complexe et coteux. Et il a suggr de ne pas utiliser de haut-parleur, de capteur ou d'appareil  commande vocale.

en_query: Summarize the discussion about product quotation.
fr_query: Rsumez la discussion sur le devis de produit.
en_summary: When evaluating the cost of the product, the group discussed some details of the components and made some adjustment on the chip, exterior cover material, curve, button and LCD screen. Then they agreed that it could be better changing the titanium to hard a hard kind of plastic looking like titanium than losing the LCD screen. They finally got an estimate of fourteen point one Euros, which was above the budget.
fr_summary: Lors de l'valuation du cot du produit, le groupe a discut de certains dtails des composants et a effectu quelques ajustements sur la puce, le matriau de la couverture extrieure, la courbe, le bouton et l'cran LCD. Ensuite, ils ont convenu qu'il serait prfrable de changer le titane en un plastique dur ressemblant  du titane plutt que de perdre l'cran LCD. Ils ont finalement obtenu une estimation de 14,10 euros, ce qui tait suprieur au budget.

en_query: What did the group talk about the appearance of the television remote?
fr_query: Qua dit le groupe sur l'apparition de la tlcommande du tlviseur ?
en_summary: In terms of putting fashion into the electronics, this is both their slogan and their design target. Apart from the company colour of black and red, the Project Manager came up with the idea of providing skins for the users. But the members were not in favour of this idea for that the work would be huge, at the same time, they were inspired to add the logo on the boot-up screen and introduce a dormant mode because most people do not want the remote to be flashing when the TV is on.
fr_summary: En termes de mode dans l'lectronique, c'est  la fois leur slogan et leur objectif de conception. Outre la couleur noire et rouge de l'entreprise, le chef de projet a eu l'ide de fournir des skins aux utilisateurs. Mais les membres n'taient pas favorables  cette ide car le travail serait norme. En mme temps, ils ont rflchi  ajouter le logo sur l'cran de dmarrage et d'introduire un mode veille car la plupart des gens ne veulent pas que la tlcommande clignote lorsque le tlviseur est allum.

en_query: What did the team say about the project and overall process?
fr_query: Qu'a dit l'quipe sur le projet et le processus global ?
en_summary: The team thought they had a really great team work experience. Everyone had put efforts into the process and gave opinions to design a good remote control. Also, the project manager showed good leadership to control the overall process.
fr_summary: L'quipe a pens qu'elle avait une trs bonne exprience de travail d'quipe. Tout le monde s'tait investi dans le processus et avait donn son avis pour concevoir une bonne tlcommande. De plus, le chef de projet a fait preuve d'un bon leadership pour contrler l'ensemble du processus.

en_query: Summarize the presentations on remote components, user interface and market trends.
fr_query: Rsumez les prsentations sur les composants distants, l'interface utilisateur et les tendances du march.
en_summary: Firstly, Industrial Designer presented on the remote components including the circuit board, the chip, the kinetic energy, the solar cell, the case shape and the interface. Next, User Interface presented on user interface including the mechanisms to operate and input data, the shape and the size, the buttons and the voice recognition as well as the scroll wheel. Then, Marketing presented on market trends. In consideration of the target age group and technology innovation, Marketing suggested the group could go for LCD, the colours and the voice recognition as well as the flat spongy material based on current trends.
fr_summary: Tout d'abord, le designer industriel a prsent les composants de la tlcommande, notamment le circuit imprim, la puce, l'nergie cintique, la cellule solaire, la forme du botier et l'interface. Ensuite, le responsable marketing a prsent les tendances du march. Compte tenu du groupe d'ge cible et de l'innovation technologique, le responsable marketing a suggr que le groupe pourrait opter pour l'cran LCD, les couleurs et la reconnaissance vocale ainsi que le matriau spongieux plat bas sur les tendances actuelles.
